alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 13 at 11:32AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through NOON EDT... At 1132 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vineyards, or near Golden Gate Estates, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Orangetree, Golden Gate, Big Corkscrew Island, Vineyards, North Naples, East Naples, Corkscrew Swamp Sanctuary, Bunker Hill, Quail Creek Estate, and Lake Trafford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
